Reviews.Content: It was a gift for my husband and I choosed this color cause it's his favorite color. He is very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Lovely!!!
Reviews.Author: Shez
Reviews.Content: Great product. Good picture quality. Lightweight and compact. Fits easily in your pocket. Touch screen is very responsive. overall, its a good bargain.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera but Wi-Fi sucks.
Reviews.Author: D. Robles
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. My last one was a Fuji, but was a little bulky and heavy.  This new slick new one can't take a bad picture.  My only complain is the Wi-Fi.  It sucks.  I have yet to figure out how to make it work.  Point and shoot , yes .  Wi-Fi, good luck.  I also found this was a common complaint on the forum pages.  If this was not an issue, then I would have given it one more star.

Reviews.Title: Great value!
Reviews.Author: tkolcz
Reviews.Content: I researched many cameras for several weeks and finally decided on the Cannon Powershot ELPH 320.  So far I am very pleased with the camera.  It's easy to use and the picture quality is excellent.  I don't find the touch screen difficult to use at all.  Many reviews mentioned that the screen wasn't very responsive and that concerned me, but I haven't had that experience.  Mine works with the touch of a finger, just fine.  We have used the self timer quite a bit and that works well.  It can be set to take 3 consecutive pictures, which is a nice feature because in my family, someone always seems to close their eyes and the 3 shots makes it more likely you will get a good shot without having to retake.  I haven't used the software to send pics thru wi-fi yet so I cannot comment on that at this time.  Overall, this camera seems to have the best bang for your buck.

Reviews.Title: Issues with the WIFI and touch screen
Reviews.Author: SRC
Reviews.Content: Other reviewers saying they have issues connecting WIFI are accurate (I gave up trying - the usb works just fine). Also the touch screen isn't very responsive but eventually with time you'll get used to it. It takes excellent pictures though and that's why I got it and for that reason I give it 4 stars.

Reviews.Title: Happy girlfriend
Reviews.Author: Roy D. Salley
Reviews.Content: Bought this for girlfriend on her birthday.  She loves it and had a good time using it to record a recent vacation.

Reviews.Title: great camera for any occasion
Reviews.Author: Ilianette Montanez
Reviews.Content: The quality of the shots produced by this camera are wonderful! Great camera for every day use & capturing special moments with family and friends! Easy to use! Love the touch screen feature! Thank you, Canon!

Reviews.Title: Works great
Reviews.Author: Thomas M. Patenaude
Reviews.Content: It works great what I have been able to figure out. there are still several more options that I have not even been able to play with yet. great camera for the price.

Reviews.Title: A bit too complicated.
Reviews.Author: Lynn S. Anderson "Grandma of 32"
Reviews.Content: I can point and shoot, the pictures are pretty good.  The zoom is OK, but there is so much stuff to learn.  The touch screen can be annoying, as I accidentally change things without wanting to.  I do like that it is very portable, and I can easily keep it in my pocket.

Reviews.Title: Great.
Reviews.Author: Susan Sharma
Reviews.Content: Love the size - very compact with high resolution pictures. Recommend it highly. Great to throw in your bag and very light

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: Rachel Dietrich "red"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my mom for a gift and she lives it, loves that it's wifi as well. She didn't need anything professional but better than her camera phone, she loves it

Reviews.Title: Really great little Camera!!
Reviews.Author: Joy
Reviews.Content: I really like this little camera. It is compact but takes really great pictures. I am not really up on the electronic gadgets but even I was able to figure it out.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: Jennifer F.
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!!  Awesome pictures.  I use it everyday.  The clarity is amazing.  I consider the product for the price a steal!!

Reviews.Title: my new camera for vacation
Reviews.Author: Nazzarus
Reviews.Content: I have not really used this camera a lot yet, still getting familiar with it. so far i like it. Wi-Fi is tricky and unable to connect to the web and smartphone so far. connects to my PC nicely.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Susan Bennett-Goulet
Reviews.Content: I agree with some other reviews that the touch screen could be more responsive, but I got this camera for just under $125 and it is a great purchase at that price.  It is so nice to not have to drag out the computer and a cable to transfer the photos to our phones.  We haven't used their direct upload service as we found we like looking at the photos on our iPhone first before sending to Facebook anyway.  Quality of photos are great and the user interface is really easy to learn.

Reviews.Title: Great camera, great lens, great photos
Reviews.Author: Sebas
Reviews.Content: I replaced a Panasonic Luminix. I have always thought their lenses were the best, however I will be returning to Canon in the future. The only benefit to the touch screen is the camera's clean look and bigger screen size. The touch screen is not a drawback, but it is not a benefit either. It is nothing like a cellphone interface. Other than that, the camera exceeds expectations on all criteria.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: lovemydogs
Reviews.Content: Picture and video quality is really good. Easy to connect to iPad or iPhone using the Canon app. But, video will not transfer to iOS device. Built in stylus that is attached to the strap is responsive to the touch screen. Overall I am very pleased with this product.

Reviews.Title: An excellent camera!
Reviews.Author: Mooshu
Reviews.Content: This is a very good point-and-shoot camera. I picture quality is very crisp and sharp. I enjoy how simple this camera is easy to use. The touch screen is not the best, but it works as expected. The UI could take some time to get used to. Overall this is a solid camera.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pics, large easy to use touchscreen w/large array of menu options.
Reviews.Author: suzanne adams
Reviews.Content: I researched this cameras category and found that for the money it gives the biggest overall bang for the buck. I have also previously owned Canons and they never fail to satisfy.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Linda J. Howenstein
Reviews.Content: Great camera at a good price.  Takes clear pictures and very good videos. I would recommend this camera to anyone who needs a small camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera Great Price
Reviews.Author: john Brillon
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my teenage daughter and she has not stopped smiling yet. This camera came as advertised and exceeded our expectations. The packaging was good delivery was okay but well worth the wait. I would highly recommend this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: easy to use, great clarity
Reviews.Author: 80s Boy
Reviews.Content: Just wish it included a memory card, but other than that...HD video is great for not just video, but you can screen grab those shots for regular stills, the clarity is so fine.

Reviews.Title: amazing!
Reviews.Author: M.
Reviews.Content: Once again, Canon did not let me down. I previously owned the SD3500 which I killed during a hiking trip; it's the only reason I had to look for a new camera. I recently shot pictures at a concert with this camera and it worked extremely well. You will get some grain for photos taken at a distance with the optical zoom, but that's to be expected. For high speed action and low lighting, the photos came out very crisp at standard zoom.I can't speak to the WiFi function because that's not the reason I purchased the camera. I wanted a similar model to my SD3500 and this was the closest option. I have never had issues with the touch screen and it actually one of the top three reasons for my purchase.Highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Great pictures, but a little hard to use
Reviews.Author: E. Ervin
Reviews.Content: I really don't like the touch screen. It's not very responsive and easy to hit the wrong "button" - and I have small fingers!! That being said, my pictures look great and there are a variety of fun settings to experiement with. I debated returning the camera because of the touch screen but have decided to keep it. Maybe it's just something that takes time to get used to...

Reviews.Title: Great camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Bill M
Reviews.Content: Hi resolution for both photos and videosSmall size makes it convenient to carry on day trips or longerIf you have an I Phone you will quickly master the touch screen commands.Really like the touch and take picture versatility of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Was an excellent gift
Reviews.Author: John Hunter Dorroh Jr.
Reviews.Content: My wife was very happy with this Canon small wifi compact camera.  Like I said she is very happy with my gift to her.

Reviews.Title: OUTSTANDING
Reviews.Author: M. Dent "G"
Reviews.Content: GREAT FEATURESEASY TO USEWONDERFUL SIZEWELL MADEGREAT VALUE FOR THE PRICECANON GOT IT RIGHTRECOMMENDED BUY

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 320 HS 16.1 MP
Reviews.Author: C. D. Welch
Reviews.Content: Excellent Little Camera for family, vacations, etc.  Small, light weight and the photos are easy. I should have gotten two!

Reviews.Title: Good!
Reviews.Author: wen tianqi
Reviews.Content: It is a good product. It's very thin and easy to carry. The auto style is very good. But there is no memory card in it, and battery can not for a long time.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: J. G. Dean "J Gary Dean"
Reviews.Content: I got this for my wife who loves to follow me around while I take "serious" photos.Turns out, this camera rivals my Canon DSLR in many ways!

Reviews.Title: Canon Elph 320Camera
Reviews.Author: Ralph W. Hawkins "Hawkeye"
Reviews.Content: Outstanding camera!!! Still learning how to use all the features. It takes great pictures and I eved tried a video!

Reviews.Title: Very good
Reviews.Author: junglebee
Reviews.Content: It is a very good camera for the price. I definitely recommend it. compact and has everything in it. Good supplier.

Reviews.Title: This one is just too slow and complicated
Reviews.Author: C. DiMarzio-Richards "ctd"
Reviews.Content: I had the older version of this Canon ELPH and I damaged it.  I thought this one would work the same, with the added feature of being able to access WIFI.  Its a much different camera.  I don't like it.  There is a really long lag time as the camera records the picture to the memory card.  By the time it finishes you've missed what it going on around you!The setting are much more complicated and I do not like the touch screen.

Reviews.Title: Could have been much better
Reviews.Author: Anubhav
Reviews.Content: Except for the resistive touch screen and a slow processor the camera is pretty slick with great features and a lot of settings. But you sure would miss a lot of KODAK moments (I really feel bad for KODAK) because of its slow response. Sony cameras are a lot faster but reproduce comparatively poor quality pictures. So, it totally depends upon your usage pattern and things that matter to you that shall decode for you which camera should you go for.

Reviews.Title: WIFI problem
Reviews.Author: kazem jafari
Reviews.Content: The camera and its quality was good, but it has wifi connection problem. I could not be connected through the wifi at all. If you are interested in this camera due to wifi, stop it!!!

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Rachel Garside
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera, it takes good pictures, it's small and easy to use.  I had a little trouble setting up the wifi, but I am sure someone with more IT background would be fine to do it easily.

Reviews.Title: I like this Camera!
Reviews.Author: Juan Carlos Gonzalez
Reviews.Content: I just buy this camera, it was a gift to my mother, she's not a technological woman and this was a perfect gift because camera is easy to use, have a useful software to manage the pictures with the touchscreen panel. I think is a very good purchase.

Reviews.Title: So small!
Reviews.Author: R2yagirl
Reviews.Content: So glad I got this, it's so small and has many features that I haven't gotten a chance to use yet. In fact, I took it out of the box, set it up and was ready to go. At some point I will read the manual so I can experience this camera to the max. I have been a long time canon fan since the sure shot max but was absolutely distracted with all the others that have come out. I went thru many brands and after using this around the house messing around, I was really glad to have a Canon again. Fits in my pocket, light weight, user friendly, great quality, 16mpxl. Hope that helps.

Reviews.Title: Worth every penny !!!
Reviews.Author: Cav
Reviews.Content: My cannon elph 320 is great it does so much I haven;t learn how to work everything yet . But I love how fast the wi-fi is to transfer to my lap top . Looking forward to learning everything it can do.

Reviews.Title: Compact and worth the money
Reviews.Author: Nirmal Kumar
Reviews.Content: Quality compact cam worth the buck! Compliments my dslr very well.Wifi sharing is a added bonus. Pls dont expect smartphone like touch interface you will be disappointed

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Thomas A Heiting
Reviews.Content: I bought this to upgrade from my 12 year old Canon PowerShot ELPH SD450, for a trip to Europe (and future uses).  The camera performs beautifully, and I would gladly recommend it to anyone interested in a great pocket camera.  The photos are very good quality.

Reviews.Title: Great for me
Reviews.Author: Samuel Rotenstreich
Reviews.Content: For my almost daily use, this camera is excellent, reliable and produces good result. The battery, although unnecessarily modified from previous version, has a long life time.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews on this and was nervous to get it. There is nothing wrong with this camera. I love it and the color is awesome. I bought this for the color accent feature and it took me alittle while to find it but its amazing. As for the touch screen, IT'S FINE. Yes, it's not as sensitive as a phone but it does work and after the first couple of times you don't even realize its an issue.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Todd Danko
Reviews.Content: Takes amazing pictures and full HD videos. It has a slim sleak feel. I Would reccomend it to a firend.

Reviews.Title: Love this little camera
Reviews.Author: J. LaBounty
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera just before going on a cruise because I wanted something small and inexpensive and I had misplaced my previous Canon camera. I debated between this one with the higher MP and another model with a higher zoom.  I am very glad I decided on this one.  It took beautiful photos on my trip, including some gorgeous sunset shots.I have no problem really with the touch screen, and found it much easier to navigate through the menus and find what I was looking for.  Yes, you do have to touch the screen with more pressure than your typical phone or Ipad, but this didn't bother me.The only downfall, as others have mentioned, is the rather short battery life.  But even with taking quite a few photos and making frequent use of zoom in/out and turning off and on, only one day did I start to get a low battery warning by the end of the port visit (about 10 hours later).  Thanks to all the warnings from other reviewers, I made sure to charge the battery every night before bed so it would be all set for the next day.  I could see how this may become a problem  though if you are in areas not easily accessible to charging your battery so frequently.  Having a backup would be a good idea.I still give the camera 5 stars for it's crisp, beautiful photos and ease of use.  It is really so much fun to use!

Reviews.Title: Decent camera for the money
Reviews.Author: E E
Reviews.Content: Pictures are good quality, touch screen sometimes a but finicky. Button for playback is a bit small and I wonder if it will hold up with time. It is a decent camera for the price, I hope it holds up over time

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Polly B.
Reviews.Content: I read all the reviews and was worried about trying it but went for it any way.  It was easy to set up the wifi (you Do have to have Windows 7 or higher) but the jumping around they have you do can be confusing.  It works great sending my pictures to my email.  Tip: use the same password every time they want one so you don't have to wonder which one to use.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE THIS CAMERA
Reviews.Author: Hayden Heun (YouTube)
Reviews.Content: I use this for my youtube channel and this is helping me out a lot theres a little learning curve but not bad.

Reviews.Title: Better than I thought it would be!
Reviews.Author: Lyle Bunn
Reviews.Content: Really great pictures... very easy to use - and when it arrived I found out that it has a rechargable battery - bonus! This was a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little camera
Reviews.Author: Patticakes
Reviews.Content: Had a very early Powershot and it lasted me about 7 yrs.Got sand in it at the beach and it finally stopped.Great pictures and video with it.Awesome camera for the money

Reviews.Title: Wonderful
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: Love this camera! Cute and compact. Battery life and image quality are excellent. I wasn't real happy that it had the rechargeable battery becasue sometimes it's easier to pop in those AA instead of having to wait and recharge one in an outlet but the battery life is great and I have purchased an extra battery that way I can atleast always have one fully charged.

Reviews.Title: Great gift!
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Bought this to give as a gift and recipient is VERY happy with it! Great buy, great price, Great for Facebook use!

Reviews.Title: very good picture came out when I first try to take some picture of my two dogs.
Reviews.Author: David Cuong Yip
Reviews.Content: I had two camera , the Sony and Olympus , but Canon look a little be better of the picture ,the color is more real and bright, but the outer material of the camera look like toy is not so frame, but any way I like it easy to carry.

Reviews.Title: canon power shot elph 320 hs
Reviews.Author: daniel nevins
Reviews.Content: I found the camera was very small and the buttons only worked if you used the plastic device attached to camera

Reviews.Title: Peforms as advertised
Reviews.Author: Yosh
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to function in my office.  We can now take photos and upload immediately to our facebook page.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Zach Newell
Reviews.Content: Takes clear photos and has a ton of different settings to chose from. So far so good! I'd say video could be better, but hey... it's a camera.

Reviews.Title: Just what I had expected
Reviews.Author: Angelica
Reviews.Content: I love my new camera! It takes the best pictures. It has a real clear and quick shot. Just what I needed in a camera. All my friends say I look like a little kid with a new toy haha. Also, I love  the blue color, it's a little different from just a regular black or silver camera. I love it would totally recommend it!

Reviews.Title: exceeds ecpectations
Reviews.Author: A. Wachtel "ARW"
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  Has a large amount of shooting modes as well as auto.  Slim and light but powerful.  I would have liked to see the "kids and pets" shooting mide as in previous canons but the high burst is a plus!

Reviews.Title: Excellent!
Reviews.Author: DANNY
Reviews.Content: I expected was very nice product, I am satisfied with the product, as they offer, pay the right price, I will continue watching deals, highly recommended!

Reviews.Title: Touch screen annoying
Reviews.Author: WA User
Reviews.Content: Why does everything have to be touch these days? With old canons you could just point/shoot and adjust even with gloves on or in the rain. With this camera, a little drizze on the screen and it goes nuts when you try to touch it (capacitive issues). Also, with a knob or button option you could make quick adjustments, now with touch you have to hope the option is on your screen or go through a bunch of menus meaning you either leave it in full auto or miss the shot. Finally, the battery is pretty small and with the screen running all the time it drains the battery quickly. Get an extra battery or recharge often.

Reviews.Title: good, easy to use camera
Reviews.Author: DW in ky
Reviews.Content: the only thing that is a little inconvenient is the battery . what would be great is if the camera could be charged like a cell phone is instead of having to remove the battery, attach to charger, plug into wall for an hour (or however long it takes to charge ) the mechanics of taking the battery out of and back into the camera is awkward . I'm still working on learning the software it's not the easiest to learn I will probably just use the windows gallery because I know it. Love the zoom and that it is small easy to carry with you and one feature I like is the simple little end on the strap that lets me always have a stylus on hand !! also I didn't have to read all the manuals to learn to use it, the screens and options are easy to understand .

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot Elph 320 HS 16.1 MP Wi-Fi Enabled Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: B. Hopkins "Betty J Hopkins"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera for my daughter after I had received one for myself.  This camera is very nice and has so many bells and whisles.  I love the face enhancer and how easy it is to download my pictures to my computer.  My daughter has been taking pictures all through Christmas and is very happy.

Reviews.Title: Can't Use Battery Charger from Previous Models
Reviews.Author: Danny Wedding "Editor, PsycCRITIQUES"
Reviews.Content: HATE that I can't use the batteries or the battery charger from my previous Digital Elphs.  Otherwise a fine camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: sbryant
Reviews.Content: Love it, best camera i've had.  Great pictures!  So much you can do with this camera.  Just in time for Christmas.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Trudi Barnes
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect size and I have loved using it.  The photos are great!  I have not figured out how to connect the blutooth option but I will do that soon!  Should be fairly easy.

Reviews.Title: Powerful Compact Camera
Reviews.Author: HubbMom4
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my anniversary. I LOVE this little camera.It's light weightEasy to use.Love the WiFi options - easy to connect to my phone so I can use my instagram and frametastic apps with better images than my phone can take.Fit easily in my pocketLOVE all the different options for taking pictures, Fishbowl, low light, portrait, handheld night scene and much more.Great small camera with large camera picture quality. Love it!

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: ALI
Reviews.Content: The touch screen is very glitchy & unstable. The picture quality is impressive along with the video quality. Over all you will enjoy the camera.

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: BoxWave Ipad Stylus
Reviews.Content: Love love love my new camera!  It shipped super fast.  It  is more than I expected.  great customer service provided.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: Oscar Mejia
Reviews.Content: Every thing went as i expected, i am happy with this item and i recommend to everybody that wants a functional phot camera!

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Juan Jimenez
Reviews.Content: I love it! is small and very powerful is just what I wanted, a compact camra let me take pictures quickly or under any scene, has many functions which you can get pretty good, and if you do not know much about photography has an automatic very intelligent which is responsible to do everything for you. I definitely think an excellent choice in price and power. I love the feature that has to synchronize the images with my iphone, I do not need to carry a laptop with me when I travel! many say the touch screen is a little slow, if it is, but it comes with a tool for easy use and smooth navigating. in conclusion has nothing to envy to others, the design, features and other functions is excellent.

Reviews.Title: Love my Canon cameras  - service is good too
Reviews.Author: J. Decker
Reviews.Content: I am now on my 4th Canon PowerShot.  I carry it with me daily as I do chores on the ranch and ride horses.  It takes great photos and short videos - even stabilizes fairly well when videos are taken while cantering on my horse - and that is a challenge.  My only real complaint is that the on - off button is too small to conveniently use.  Impossible to use wearing gloves.  I have to take them off to use the camera.  I wish they would make a larger button.  I've had to send a couple of the cameras back for repair and their service has been excellent too.  I'm a loyal Canon user.

Reviews.Title: Documentation needs improvement
Reviews.Author: Frank Barraza
Reviews.Content: Camera is very good, but both the written quick start and the on-line manual are lacking in detail especailly relating to the WIFI set up of the camera and links to your home computer.

Reviews.Title: great camera
Reviews.Author: cwalls
Reviews.Content: i amjust learning out to work it but it seems to take great picture i love the touch screen. i also love the color

Reviews.Title: Great little wide angle camera
Reviews.Author: SmackiuS
Reviews.Content: Took this camera on a trip to Italy.  The battery life is great, the resolution is great, and the touch screen is a neat gimmick although not really a feature to pay extra for.  I haven't used the Wifi.One thing I didn't really think about, which is more a comment about photography in general I guess, is that the short focal length seems to accentuate shots taken off-axis.  Compared to my previous point and shoot, I would take pictures by holding the camera up over a crowd, and they would come out looking really crooked.  It seems that when shooting wide angle, it's especially important to make sure the shot is framed carefully.Back to this camera though:  It definitely helped me capture some amazing pictures.  Resolution is great, speed is great, low light pictures are great, battery is great.  I'd say this is a five star value.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera
Reviews.Author: terrivanilla
Reviews.Content: I really love the quality of the picture. I love the ease at how quickly I can snap another picture. The touch screen is very delicate because when you are trying to do things it either happens or it does what you don't want it to. Meaning that your fingers are to big for the buttons. I had tried setting up the wireless but it was not working so I gave up trying. Once I have more time I will try again. This was a great buy. I had an elph before so it was great to get this upgrade.

Reviews.Title: NICE CANON CAM
Reviews.Author: joseph kaddissi
Reviews.Content: REFER TO THE PRICE ITS A NICE PRODUCT FROM CANON AND NICE PICTURE WITH GREAT DESIGN.WIRELESS AND TOUCH SCREEN IS OKEY NOT BAD

Reviews.Title: Great camera in a small package
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "CT Rebel"
Reviews.Content: I have a nice, fullsize SLR Canon that I use most of the time.  However, sometimes you want something small that you can stash in a pocket or purse, but you still want quality photos.  This little camera fits the bill.  Impossibly small, but great photos every time.  Replaced a 5 year old ELPH,and am pleasantly surprised by the new features and enhanced ability to take photos in different light conditions.

Reviews.Title: Good purchase
Reviews.Author: Ray Highfill
Reviews.Content: Easy camera to use, touch screen required reading instructions of course. Good detail in shadows and highlights, I use PS Elements for post processing. Quick and easy to get very good photos.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Undrae R. Winding "URW"
Reviews.Content: I use this camera every day for my business.  I takes good pics in all sorts of lighting conditions.  I just used the camera for a wedding reception.  It was in a dark lounge.  The pics exceeded my expectation.

Reviews.Title: Works Perfectly
Reviews.Author: Moises Hernendez
Reviews.Content: It all works really well but not sure if the Wi-Fi was really worth it since its rarely used but over all i got what i paid for and its working perfectly

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot ELPH 320 HS 16.1 MP Wi-Fi Enabled
Reviews.Author: peekaboo
Reviews.Content: I loved it.  It shipped so fast.  It was better than what I was anticipating.  I love the blue color.  It takes great pictures.  I would definitely recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Debbie Quagliozzi
Reviews.Content: I had drowned my 6 year old canon digital which prior to the accident worked great. I quickly replaced it and while researching the canon website settled on the 320. I have not utilized the wifi feature, which was one of many appealing features. Apparently it does not work with vista so it won't synch with my laptop. I love the led touch screen. I will need to avoid scratching it...the auto features are all i have really used but i will take advantage of the other features (manual). It is slim, light and a great little camera.

Reviews.Title: Better than I'd imagined
Reviews.Author: mike f
Reviews.Content: Great job in low light, finally. And exposures are true to life and light is tremendously balanced. Do yourself a favor and start playing with the different automated exposures sooner.Would definitely buy again. Tremendous value for the money

Reviews.Title: Perfect for personal use with single handedly.
Reviews.Author: Libra
Reviews.Content: Fantastic performance, except battery life could be little bit longer . Other than this , it is one of the best performer with all of its various options. I would recommend my friends for personal use.

Reviews.Title: Do not buy - Lens Error - check the links in my review for more information
Reviews.Author: Leo
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this camera nor the HS310/HS300 if you want them to last a while. There are inherent bugs in Canon's software that they have not worked out that will cause these cameras to stop functioning at some point in time with the "Lens Error". Unforunately by that time you will be out of warranty.When it works the camera works fine. The videos look great, outdoor shots are excellent, whereas indoor photo quality varies.If you are convinced this is the camera for you, search "Lens Error" for the HS300/HS310 before you make your final decision. I would recommend the S95 over this one though it costs an extra $100.[...] - users that have run into the "lens error" problem.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Savannah
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera. It's easy to use. Perfect quality, settings, everything. I really enjoy the focus on it. :3

Reviews.Title: Touch screen is awful
Reviews.Author: Jared
Reviews.Content: The photo quality is pretty good but the touch screen is not very sensitive and since you have to use it to change any setting it was really annoying.  We decided to return this model and get the original Elph 300.  The 16.1mp shouldn't differ too much from the 12.1mp.  I didn't even get to trying the wireless upload but I read other complaints about it and that is something that is not that big a deal for me to connect to the computer to upload.

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!!! This is my go to camera. Have been using it for over a year and I still love it!
Reviews.Author: Mra2025
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!! In the past, I have owned cameras from many different brands and by far from my experience, Canon and Panasonic have always exceeded my expectations. I went with this camera after doing a lot of research and most of the times, the negative reviews were always about the touch screen which was actually the reason I was drawn to this one from the rest. I purchased the dark pinkish color because it was such an unique color for a camera. After using the camera for over a year, I can truly say that the touch screen is not a big deal at all. It doesn't lag and neither is it unresponsive. While the touch screen may not be as easy as the iPhone touchscreen, it is just as effective.I truly love the touch screen! It is very easy to go to the menu and display options. There is also a small button on the camera next to the touch screen where you can review the images fast and easily with one click. I absolutely love this camera because of the amazing photos it takes because that is what really matters, right? Well you won't regret buying this cameral. I have taken photos in pitch dark literally not knowing what i was taking photos, and with flash, it seemed liked I had sufficient light because the photos came out bright and clear. This cameras flash by far outperforms any other camera  thatI have ever owned, and I have owned many. I have to mention again how incredible the flash on this little thing is!!! I absolutely love it  and the capture speed is also amazing because it is fast!!. I also wanted to mention that this camera is small and lightweight to fit in pockets and clutches and purses.The only negative thing about this camera was the wifi, it was kinda slow to send the photos but the wifi wasn't really a buying point for me, so I didn't really mind its effectiveness. Other than that, I would definitely recommend this product. I have taken hundred of photos during my honeymoon that I have printed out and put on 16x20 canvases and you would think that these photos were professionally taken but they were taken by this camera. The small little details that really stand out when you blow a image on to a canvas can easily show impurities. Photos taken by this camera have always been perfect.

Reviews.Title: Great image, poor sound
Reviews.Author: S. Grigore "Sorin"
Reviews.Content: I used the camera for 2 days. It takes great pictures, including indoors. The one I got has issues with the movies sound: a hiss like strong wind or roaring water over the normal sound. And the sound is recorded uneven.

Reviews.Title: Fail!
Reviews.Author: LSDP "LSDP"
Reviews.Content: Unbelievable. It just died on me the day after my Amazon warranty expired. But I called Canon, sent it back to them, and they replaced it with a brand new one though that whole process took more than a month.

Reviews.Title: Love Canon
Reviews.Author: T. Poole
Reviews.Content: This easy to use point and shoot is everything I expected! I absolutely love it! And the light weight makes it easy to handle.

Reviews.Title: A good little point and shoot
Reviews.Author: M
Reviews.Content: This is the second Canon I have owned...the first was stolen and this is the replacement.  It is a very simple camera to set up and use but I knocked a star off for VERY POOR battery life.The "tap" the screen to take the photo feature is kind of redundant but overall a well thought out camera.I do seem to be having connectivity issues with the WiFi but that's why they make cables!  If it were WiFi only I would knock it down to one star...Small enough to fit in a shirt pocket but big enough to hold onto.  My first road trip with the camera is coming up so we'll see how it does.  I already expect battery life to be an issue, so I will use a car dc to ac inverter to keep it charged...Still, if they would have just used a larger capacity battery it wouldn't be an issue.At the $158 bucks I paid for it on Amazon, I feel it is a decent value.  If you paid retail...you paid waaaay too much for this little snapper.Cheers!

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift for my Children
Reviews.Author: T. G. Kraft
Reviews.Content: They love it.  And they want me to write more. so here are more words to make them happy with the review.

Reviews.Title: Returned for 110
Reviews.Author: Laura T.
Reviews.Content: I returned this camera for its similar counterpart, the Canon PowerShot ELPH 110. I was hesitant after my touch-screen Nikon CoolPix busted not long after I purchased it. I purchased this one because it had WiFi capability. While it shipped, I had buyer's remorse, and looked into the 110. It's the same as the 320 save the touchscreen and WiFI. Because I don't really need another device to connect to the internet, I decided to return it for the simpler, perhaps better model.Please note I did not play around with this camera, and do not know if it's better or worse than the 110, just that I had read a lot of reviews about the touchscreen problems, and my own touchscreen problems with my Nikon (NOT Canon).

Reviews.Title: Pretty great camera!
Reviews.Author: M. Zator
Reviews.Content: Just ordered this camera the other day and it came in yesterday. It was pretty easy to set up, just had to charge the battery and go. It took a bit to get the Wi-Fi set up and to connect to my computer but my technology savvy boyfriend was able to help. The Wi-Fi feature is really great since I can send pictures straight to facebook, e-mail, or youtube. I love it because usually my mom wants pictures of my nephew and I can just e-mail them to her while I'm still at her house. The touch screen is alright, right now I'm having some difficulty with it, but the stylus does help. I think I'll get the hang of it soon. I do love the color, I got mine in blue and it's a really great shade of blue. I can't comment on the battery life just yet since I just put the battery in yesterday to get it set up and take a couple pictures. Overall it's a nice camera and I'm really happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Personality of expensive camera for easy price.
Reviews.Author: Sandy C
Reviews.Content: This camera is great if you require everything you own to be touch screen. It takes great pictures, and has many features that can be found on high end cameras costing much more, such as "fish-eye," and others. The low light setting is great. The camera is easy to operate and is compact enough to take everywhere.If you want lots of camera that can go beyond your phone, this camera is for you.

Reviews.Title: Edited Review!
Reviews.Author: Ashley
Reviews.Content: Maybe its just me but I dislike the whole wifi thing. I mean it's okay but pretty useless. I was excited about it at first (the wifi) but once I started messing around with it, it wasn't what I expected. Just use it as a regular ol' camera and you'll be happy. Or save yourself some time and frustration and just buy an Elph 110. I hear it's pretty much the same exact camera but without the touch screen. I'm satisfied with this camera, just not with the wifi. I could care less about it. I just barley got this camera today though so if something amazing pops up I'll update this review.UPDATE! 09 - 08 - 12It's been about a week or so since I've had this camera. What I really dislike about this camera is the audio quality. It's TERRIBLE. Also, when you zoom in, it's as loud as a mother trucker so when you record a video you will definitely hear it. Don't know why but it just bugs me. By the way! Zoom is extremely slow when recording. My other elph camera was pretty fast when it came to zooming so this one disappoints me. I guess I'll just have to make it work until I can afford a better one.Update (again) 10 - 12 - 12After about a week since writing my first update I called customer service about the loud zooming noise and because I was still under warranty I sent my camera in. The person I was talking to said that the camera's zoom shouldn't have been sounding the way it did and they sent me a brand new one (or refurbished). The lens zooms in much faster than before. I probably was just sent a broken camera. Everything works perfect now. (Audio is still pretty terrible)

Reviews.Title: Pretty little camera
Reviews.Author: E. Lemberger "erikastudiopro5"
Reviews.Content: Although this model is nicer looking then the 300HS I find that that camera had a faster shot to shot time!  The touch panel on the back of the 320 HS is just annoying to use. Until Canon perfects that and makes it more useable and responsive (iPhone like), I would rather be using the button input method!The Wi-Fi picture sending option also needs perfecting as in theory it is a nice feature but in practice tedious and doesnt seem to find a connection more often then not.

Reviews.Title: Best little pocket camera saver
Reviews.Author: Bruce
Reviews.Content: This is the best point and shoot pocket camera I've ever had, and I have tried many. I would defiantly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Useless WiFi
Reviews.Author: Morning "morning"
Reviews.Content: Looks like you get 10GB free on CANON iMAGE GATEWAY but NEVER rely on it. Wifi is useless until it syncs to g drive/picasa, dropbox and flickr. Canon is going extinct like polaroid/kodak for failing to stay up to date. I'm really about to just start using my cell phone and sell my camera. I get instant uploads to dropbox. Get the Canon PowerShot ELPH 310 HS instead. It's quite expensive right now because it is so much better.

Reviews.Title: Read this and save yourself a lot of time!
Reviews.Author: Pauleni
Reviews.Content: Just got off the phone after a 3 hour conversation with Canon technical support.  I have to admire their patience and perseverance, however after innumerable retries to establish a wifi connection to my Asus Transformer Prime tablet it was concluded that this camera would not work with an Android system, unless you have an access point for both devices.  In other words it will not connect directly with an Android tablet. It will also not connect to my Netgear N router which, in turn, will not allow any communication with my home network of three computers.  What a bummer!  All this after 3 hours on the phone with Canon.According to Canon, the wifi in the camera is working properly so it is going to be up to me to figure out any problem with my router. If it were not for the wifi issue I would be extremely happy with this camera.  It switches seamlessly between photos and video, takes really nice pictures and is easy to use.  The lack of buttons is not an issue since in the long run everything is going to be working with touch screens anyway.As a camera, it is great, as a wifi device, it's terrible.  If anyone has managed to connect this camera to an android device directly, please let us know.

Reviews.Title: Pocket camera Cannon
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This little camera has so many options that its unbelieveable how good it really is , worth the price easy, sharpe clear pictures , small enough to easlie carry, I got the 32 gb card so it hold vast amounts of pictures and video,without having to down load, last camera I had was the sony cybershot,DSW1 with the adaptable lens for wide angle and telescopic, great camera for its time just pastits time with only 5 megapixels , GREAT BUY!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot
Reviews.Author: tonyP
Reviews.Content: This Canon Powershot 320, makes some nice photos, very sharp and lots of options.  Video Recording with this camera is HD,  very Good quality and in HD very sharp and clear,  better than my other camera Nikon D5000.  Easy to carry around , and ready to take pictures .  I'm very happy with the camera results, a well invested small camera.Only thing I recommend you guys is buy Wasabi Power Battery with charger, because the oem battery runs out quick, but this fixes your problem !

Reviews.Title: Great easy to use!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "TVHunting"
Reviews.Content: I really like this camera!  Easy to use and with a few clicks of some buttons, you can upload pics to your computer via wi-fi.  Pictures are literally perfect every time.  You don't have to wait forever for it to focus to take a pic whether close up or far away.

Reviews.Title: got the product. prompt and fast delivery.
Reviews.Author: mohan krishna
Reviews.Content: Fast and prompt delivery. I though that the usb conector for this device is intended as a charger too and then i started talking to seller. his response is very fast. just a note to all the usb connector is to use to download the pictures to computer and it is not a charger. apart from that every thing is good. and I like the seller fast response and promptness.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful tiny camera
Reviews.Author: South District "DelDOT S/D"
Reviews.Content: While it is described as red, I think of it being closer to fuschia -- either way it makes it easier to distinguish this camera from all the guys' cameras in the district.  I personally don't use it, but I've received no complaints.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what I was looking for.
Reviews.Author: Eileen Axt
Reviews.Content: This camera does everything I required including taking great pictures.  Uploading pictures to Facebook is a breeze; a feature I was really looking for.  I would highly recommend this camera.  In addition, the camera was well packed and was delivered in no time!  That is only one of the reasons I always shop with AMAZON.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot
Reviews.Author: Irene F.
Reviews.Content: This camera is ok. The touch screen is junk and almost impossible to make it work. I need to have moist fingers to help stuff move on the screen. My SLR got old and I bought this camera thinking it would be easier to upload pictures with WiFi capabilities that was promoted with this camera. I was unable to log into facebook and share my pictures that are not that good in focus quality because of junky touch screen. If I'll ever need something like that again I would not go for this camera.

Reviews.Title: PRODUCT FAILURE
Reviews.Author: John Willy Huaillani Carrillo
Reviews.Content: The digital camera with wi-fi, buy it 06 months ago, however since I started using the camera function not working wi-fi could not connect wirelessly to my home network, so I could not send from the my camera, photos to any social network, thought it was a configuration problem but when check with people who had already purchased the same product they said they had not had such a problem.It's been 06 months since then and just used my camera to its primary function, which is to take photos and record videos, but his plus which is the wi-fi, and why buy the camera which I never saw work.Thank you very much for your attention.Best Regards

Reviews.Title: I love it

Reviews.Content: I love it for the money I have in it. Take's real nice pic's and with my Bing point's I saved a lot of cash and got it for a real steal price on sale too...

Reviews.Title: dissappointed

Reviews.Content: not as easy to use as described. wifi doesn't work too smoothly either. when we read all about the camera it sounded like the right choice but not now after using it.

Reviews.Content: The only thing I don't like about the camera is that it won'tconnect to my network??????fix that and it's perfect!

Reviews.Content: Muy buena la camara muy buenas funciones se las recomiendo nomes muy cara y tiene todo lo basico . .

Reviews.Content: has done a great job so fargood pictures, adequate speed with auto focusface recognition works wellwaiting to set the wifi up

Reviews.Title: Unable to setup WiFI
Reviews.Author: buyingstuff
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for approximately a month and have attempted several times to configure the WiFi file transfer.  My home computer and network is nothing unusual, Vista and Norton Firewall, but I have been frustrated in getting the camera to connect.  I would not recommend a purchase if WiFi file transfer is your prime motivation.Otherwise, the camera takes great pictures.  The touch screen requires a little more than what I would describe a "normal" force to accept input, but that's no big deal once you get used to it.

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: GEORGE STEVE TORRES
Reviews.Content: Image and sound is good, im glad to have it.I had some troubles when i conect to my TV, it doesnt recognize video format file.

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: Emmett Robichaux
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my wife who doesn't like to carry around my Canon Rebel. After playing around with it, I found that it takes every bit as good a picture as the Rebel and has a few more perks.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera and HD video recorder!
Reviews.Author: Alessandro
Reviews.Content: This camera is a must have for anyone who wants an inconspicuous and clever way to take perfect pictures and HD video combined with having the ease of playback on an HD AnyNet+ (HDMI-CEC)-enabled TV!  It works flawlessly!

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: janie
Reviews.Content: Was so excited to receive the only thing good was picture quality touchscreen was more like push hard screen no way to view pics taken on device also says wifi but no way to download/upload pix unless connected device to USB I'm returning n upgrading to new Sony hope it fares better

Reviews.Title: Not the camerafor you if you want wifi
Reviews.Author: Andrea B.
Reviews.Content: This camera did not have any instructions on how to access the wifi portion of the camera... Which was the only reason I got It. I sent it back and got the Samsung wifi camera,  which is great.

Reviews.Title: Connection failed...connection failed...connection failed
Reviews.Author: chava
Reviews.Content: The camara takes nice pictures when the conditions are excellent outside but then again any cheaper camera can.  There is no way to connect the Wi-Fi. Played with the Firewall, did everything and NOTHING worked, it won't connect! The compartment for the battery and card is cheap and fail to close very well.  Overall, very dissapointed.

Reviews.Title: This Camera is nice
Reviews.Author: Shihui
Reviews.Content: The appearance is cool. The additional functions of WIFI and touch panel are useful. The LCD is large enough. I have not used the wide-angle lens, hence I cannot evaluate it. In general,  I like it.

Reviews.Title: exelent
Reviews.Author: J. Griswold "lizzygrizzy"
Reviews.Content: It takes good pictures.  I like the zoom and angles ( wide) Still have to learn to take moviesThe size is good.

Reviews.Title: Good Camera... WiFi setup complicated
Reviews.Author: Anonymous
Reviews.Content: This camera takes wonderful shots and has a lot of fun features.  THe WiFi setup however was very complicated and the instructions included with the camera were not very clear.  Had to go online to the Canon site to find some steps that were not included with the camera instructions.  And you have to setup an account with the Canon Camera Gateway, load the camera window software, etc.  Bottom line, once setup WIFI works great, but was a frustrating multi-step process to get all the devices and websites connected.

Reviews.Title: NO WIFI
Reviews.Author: Marija
Reviews.Content: I just received this camera and very very disapointed. The main reason i have purchased this one is WIFI that DOESN'T WORK!!!I had samsung SH100 and wifi works great with 1 step you can upload your pics on facebook without instruction at all! I returned that camera and payed tripple amount for this one :( Well i wish I can say 'i've got what i have payed for' in this case... Qulity of  pictures is good but i could of gotten camera with better zoom and way more features for less money but i was looking for cordless wifi camera. Somehow when i was about to buy i could't read in reviews the problem with wifi and connection. I will try to return this camera or exchange for different one. It's cute lill cam i like design and stile but having a smart phone with short batery life im not able to get pics use gps and talk and text so i got camera thinking that wifi feature will help mi a lot. Knowing that never can go wrong with Canon i was so excited to get one and start taking pictures...but i cant do anything without cord and comp...Canon please fix this and get deserved 5 stars for the product!

Reviews.Title: Aida Maria Guran
Reviews.Author: Aida Guran
Reviews.Content: At first time I thinking that is not work because i had a few problems but after 1 hour I found out the secret how it is work and now is very good 99%!!

Reviews.Title: Nice pictures, but the battery case/memory card door didn't work properly
Reviews.Author: Mandy
Reviews.Content: I have had a series of Canon P&S; cameras in addition to my dSLR's.  I like the ease of having the P&S; in my purse to take fun pictures.  I ordered this and it quickly arrived from Amazon.  Opened box, charged the battery, and used it for a few snaps around the house using the flash.I took the battery & memory card out to charge the battery again (I may not have charged it all the way the first time).  Anyway, I had a problem getting the battery to click into place and the door closed.  The battery door was not a solid/sturdy piece of plastic.  All of the doors for all of my other canon's have been a solid piece.  I had to mess around with the battery trying to get it to click into place.  The little lever didn't seem to be working properly either.I really wanted to like this camera.  I think I took 100 pictures of the dogs and I have no complaints about the picture quality or the photo taking options.  I just can't keep this camera if one of the first times I am loading the battery it doesn't work properly.  I am returning it thanks to an easy return process to Amazon.  I will have to research other models to decide which camera to order next.

Reviews.Title: Error 32
Reviews.Author: Jorge Emilio Vasquez
Reviews.Content: Amazon recently bought this device. It presents a manufacturing error by manufacturer and has an error 32 on screen that automatically turns off the camera.I made the complaint to Amazon and the return regulation allows only one month to make the change. The error is presented after a month of purchase.Note sure if this purchase.

Reviews.Title: NOT Red!!
Reviews.Author: Donna Grimmer "Donna"
Reviews.Content: This camera is not red. It is a bright hot pink. This is not a problem for me except I ordered a red case that now I have to return. Camera great, just remember you are getting hot pink.

Reviews.Title: Lens Error on Starting camera
Reviews.Author: Ram
Reviews.Content: As soon as I got this camera, I charged the battery and then tried to switch on. The Lens came out but then I keep getting an error ' Lens Error , Camera switch off Automatically'.I am returning this camera back to Amazon.I bought matching memory card and case. Unfortunately I cannot return associated items to amazon bcos technically those are not defective!

Reviews.Title: No memory CARD
Reviews.Author: Donald Niska
Reviews.Content: I ordered this camera for my wife's birthday to take on vacationand found out when trying to use the camera it was not ready totake pictures.  There is no memory card in the camera, even a cheapywith small memory to get started.  very disappointed.  I did notsee any other reviews that indicated a memory card was a must toorder or I would have ordered for birthday at the same time as the camera.

Reviews.Title: Cheap and best
Reviews.Author: aspi
Reviews.Content: What can you get at the best price which is so good and branded stuff which one use wont forget .

Reviews.Title: WI-FI CONNECTION? DON'T COUNT ON IT!
Reviews.Author: Isabel M. Simonetti
Reviews.Content: Another reviewer claims that if you play with the Firewall enough on your computer you can install the Wi-Fi capability.  I turned off the Firewall on my two wireless computers and NOTHING, it won't connect. If it is about image quality and "auto" capabilities you can buy any other camera for less...way less.

Reviews.Title: Just got it, .......
Reviews.Author: roaeja "Hey you!"
Reviews.Content: First impression, NICE!  Setting up wifi was a breeze.  Italmost set itself up.  BUT, the instruction book is foran older camera!  Hopefully, the one on the disc is current.But, really, do you need one?  Can't wait to take it outside!Later...Can't figure out how to wifi my photo's to computer.The instruction book and on disk, is for  Canon 340 and 510,not 530 instruction to tell you how to set up the wifi?Making this camera for stupid people useless.And there isn't any stylus included.  Some people blowsmoke out their rear.  If I can't get the wifi going, I'llhave to send it back.  Overall, the camera is superb,half superb.  And half the apps that come on the discDON'T WORK!!!I sent Canon an email, hoping they will give me a link to the320HS camera and tell me how to set up wifi.  In the meantime I put in an Eye-fi card.  Kinda defeats the purpose ofowning a wifi camera, with no instructions and a camerathat won't set it up.Here's link for setting up wifi on Canon web site....[...]Well, this seem to work for WEP password security.  Apparently YOU have to select the playback > icon, touch thewifi icon and then select which device you want the picture uploaded to!!!  It won't do it by itself.  You have to doit each time you want to use wifi, to upload pictures!!!!  Just how stupid is this???!!!I'm sending mine back..why pay extra for wifi that is a drag to use and no manual for it?!!  GONE!!

Reviews.Title: Not worth the trouble
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "Neil"
Reviews.Content: The camera is...meh, it's a camera.  It does some stuff ok.  But the Wifi application is completely useless.Here's how to make this camera better. Step 1: get rid of the OS and software on this camera.  Step 2: install android on this camera.  Step 3: add a 3G radio.  Step 4: make the touch screen a better piece of hardware.  Step 5...oh wait, that's a cell phone.Though not incredibly expensive, this camera is worthless.  Just use your phone, it'll come out almost as well and be far far easier to deal with.  If you really want high-quality pictures, just get a used DSLR off craigslist.  That'll be cheaper, the photos will be better, and it's not really any less convenient to carry around a big bulky camera and a cell phone than it is to carry around an elph and a cell phone.  Really, you don't need a dSLR most likely, you just need your phone.I think Canon's digital camera business is just about over with...
